meanings.definition: A cylindrical roll of finely cut tobacco cured for smoking.
meanings.sent1: I saw John smoking cigarettes outside the store.
meanings.sent2: My uncle always carries a pack of cigarettes in his pocket.
meanings.sent3: The cigarettes in the old movie made everyone cough comically.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced around the cigarettes like they were delicate wands.
meanings.sent5: The smell of cigarettes lingered in the air long after the party ended.

meanings.definition: A small paper-wrapped cylinder of finely cut tobacco for smoking.
meanings.sent1: She offered me a few cigarettes from her pack.
meanings.sent2: The convenience store sells various brands of cigarettes.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled out a never-ending string of cigarettes from his hat.
meanings.sent4: The city lights at night looked like glowing cigarettes in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The cigarettes in the ashtray were still smoldering.
